children.name: 又切
children.en: the fanqie for the other pronunciation

children.name: 变例
children.en: complementary principles of the interconnection method

children.name: 四声相承
children.en: tonal relation within a rhyme set

children.name: 支脂之三分
children.en: hypothesis that the three neighbouring sets of rhymes of zhi，zhi and zhi in qieyun belong to three different rhyme groups in old Chinese

children.name: 脂微分部
children.en: a hypothesis that the rhymes of zhi and wei in qieyun belong to two different rhyme groups in old Chinese

children.name: 三等喻化
children.en: a hypothesis that initials of the third division are palatalized

children.name: 古无去声
children.en: a hypothesis that there is no departing tone category in old Chinese

children.name: 古无舌上音
children.en: a hypothesis that there are no laminals in old Chinese

children.name: 古无轻唇音
children.en: ahypothesis that there are no “light” labials in old Chinese

children.name: 喻三归匣
children.en: a hypothesis that the yu initial at the third division belongs to the xia initial in old Chinese

children.name: 喻四归定
children.en: a hypothesis that the yu initial at the fourth division belongs to the ding initial in old Chinese

children.name: 四声一贯
children.en: a hypothesis that tonal distinctions are merged in old Chinese verses

children.name: 娘日归泥
children.en: a hypothesis that the initial categories of niang and er belong to the category of ni in old Chinese

children.name: 日汉对音
children.en: Japanese transcription of the borrowed Chinese words

children.name: 朝汉对音
children.en: Korean transcription of the borrowed Chinese words

children.name: 梵汉对音
children.en: Chinese transcription of the Sanskrit words

children.name: 浊上变去
children.en: rising tone of the sinigrams with voiced initials become departing tone

children.name: 浊音清化
children.en: the process of voiced obstruents becoming voiceless

children.name: 藏汉对音
children.en: Chinese transcription of the old Tibetan words

children.name: 越汉对音
children.en: Vietnamese transcription of the borrowed Chinese words
